name: beszel
description: Beszel is a lightweight server monitoring dashboard that supports resource metrics across multiple machines. It offers real-time stats for CPU, RAM, disk, and network usage through a sleek web-based interface.
features: Multi-Server Monitoring: Track resource metrics across multiple machines from one dashboard. Centralized visibility.
Real-Time Stats: Live monitoring of CPU, RAM, disk, and network usage. Instant performance insights.
Lightweight Design: Minimal resource footprint won't slow down your servers. Efficient monitoring.
Sleek Web Interface: Modern, intuitive dashboard for easy navigation. Beautiful data visualization.
Cross-Platform: Monitor Linux, Windows, and macOS servers seamlessly. Universal compatibility.
Self-Hosted: Complete control over your monitoring infrastructure and data. Privacy guaranteed.
Historical Data: Track performance trends over time with data retention. Understand patterns.
Alert Capabilities: Get notified when resources exceed thresholds. Proactive monitoring.
